/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is from the middle of the street, looking down its length. On either side of the street, lush greenery flourishes, with trees and shrubs dotting the landscape. A brick wall runs parallel to the street, adding a rustic charm to the scene. 

In the distance, the cityscape of Beijing unfolds. Tall buildings rise against the backdrop of a hazy blue sky, their silhouettes faint but unmistakable. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking down its length towards the city. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and urban life, a common sight in many cities around the world.
